channel.title: Posts on James Cao
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on James Cao

item.title: Crew CTF 2025 - Love Notes Write-up
item.description: Write messages to your crush but watch out, some hide secrets and some notes are better left unread

item.title: TryHackMe - SQL Injection Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn how to detect and exploit SQL Injection vulnerabilities

item.title: TryHackMe - Detecting Web Attacks Room Walkthrough
item.description: Explore web attacks and detection methods through log and network traffic analysis.

item.title: TryHackMe - OWASP Top 10 2021 Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about and exploit each of the OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities; the 10 most critical web security risks.

item.title: TryHackMe - Intro to Digital Forensics Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about digital forensics and related processes and experiment with a practical example.

item.title: TryHackMe - Advent of Cyber 2024 Room Walkthrough
item.description: Dive into the wonderful world of cyber security by engaging in festive beginner-friendly exercises every day in the lead-up to Christmas!

item.title: TryHackMe - Hydra Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about and use Hydra, a fast network logon cracker, to bruteforce and obtain a website's credentials.

item.title: TryHackMe - Network Services 2 Room Walkthrough
item.description: Enumerating and Exploiting More Common Network Services & Misconfigurations

item.title: TryHackMe - Kenobi Room Walkthrough
item.description: Walkthrough on exploiting a Linux machine. Enumerate Samba for shares, manipulate a vulnerable version of proftpd and escalate your privileges with path variable manipulation.

item.title: TryHackMe - Metasploit Introduction Room Walkthrough
item.description: An introduction to the main components of the Metasploit Framework.

item.title: TryHackMe - Vulnversity Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about active recon, web app attacks and privilege escalation.

item.title: TryHackMe - Intro To IaC Room Walkthrough
item.description: An introduction to infrastructure as code.

item.title: TryHackMe - Windows Fundamentals Part 3 Room Walkthrough
item.description: In part 3 of the Windows Fundamentals module, learn about the built-in Microsoft tools that help keep the device secure, such as Windows Updates, Windows Security, BitLocker, and more...

item.title: TryHackMe - Windows Fundamentals Part 2 Room Walkthrough
item.description: In part 2 of the Windows Fundamentals module, discover more about System Configuration, UAC Settings, Resource Monitoring, the Windows Registry and more..

item.title: TryHackMe - Windows Fundamentals Part 1 Room Walkthrough
item.description: In part 1 of the Windows Fundamentals module, we'll start our journey learning about the Windows desktop, the NTFS file system, UAC, the Control Panel, and more.

item.title: TryHackMe - What Is Networking Room Walkthrough
item.description: Begin learning the fundamentals of computer networking in this bite-sized and interactive module.

item.title: TryHackMe - Web Application Security Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about web applications and explore some of their common security issues.

item.title: TryHackMe - Unified Kill Chain Room Walkthrough
item.description: The Unified Kill Chain is a framework which establishes the phases of an attack, and a means of identifying and mitigating risk to IT assets.

item.title: TryHackMe - The Hacker Methodology Room Walkthrough
item.description: Introduction to the Hacker Methodology

item.title: TryHackMe - Starting Out In Cyber Sec Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about the different career paths in Cyber Security and how TryHackMe can help!

item.title: TryHackMe - Red Team OPSEC Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn how to apply Operations Security (OPSEC) process for Red Teams.

item.title: TryHackMe - Red Team Fundamentals Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about the basics of a red engagement, the main components and stakeholders involved, and how red teaming differs from other cyber security engagements.

item.title: TryHackMe - Pyramid Of Pain Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn what is the Pyramid of Pain and how to utilize this model to determine the level of difficulty it will cause for an adversary to change the indicators associated with them, and their campaign.

item.title: TryHackMe - Pentesting Fundamentals Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn the important ethics and methodologies behind every pentest.

item.title: TryHackMe - OWASP Top 10 Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about and exploit each of the OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities; the 10 most critical web security risks.

item.title: TryHackMe - OHSINT Room Walkthrough
item.description: Are you able to use open source intelligence to solve this challenge?

item.title: TryHackMe - Offensive Security Intro Room Walkthrough
item.description: Hack your first website (legally in a safe environment) and experience an ethical hacker's job.

item.title: TryHackMe - Network Services Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about, then enumerate and exploit a variety of network services and misconfigurations.

item.title: TryHackMe - Linux Modules Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn linux modules in a fun way.

item.title: TryHackMe - Linux Fundamentals Part 1 Room Walkthrough
item.description: Embark on the journey of learning the fundamentals of Linux. Learn to run some of the first essential commands on an interactive terminal.

item.title: TryHackMe - Junior Security Analyst Intro Room Walkthrough
item.description: Play through a day in the life of a Junior Security Analyst, their responsibilities and qualifications needed to land a role as an analyst.

item.title: TryHackMe - Intro To Research Room Walkthrough
item.description: A brief introduction to research skills for pentesting.

item.title: TryHackMe - Intro To Networking Room Walkthrough
item.description: An introduction to networking theory and basic networking tools

item.title: TryHackMe - HTTP in Detail Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about how you request content from a web server using the HTTP protocol

item.title: TryHackMe - Google Dorking Room Walkthrough
item.description: Explaining how Search Engines work and leveraging them into finding hidden content!

item.title: TryHackMe - Nmap Room Walkthrough
item.description: An in depth look at scanning with Nmap, a powerful network scanning tool.

item.title: TryHackMe - DNS In Detail Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn how DNS works and how it helps you access internet services.

item.title: TryHackMe - Defensive Security Intro Room Walkthrough
item.description: Introducing defensive security and related topics, such as Threat Intelligence, SOC, DFIR, Malware Analysis, and SIEM.

item.title: TryHackMe - Cyber Kill Chain Room Walkthrough
item.description: The Cyber Kill Chain framework is designed for identification and prevention of the network intrusions. You will learn what the adversaries need to do in order to achieve their goals.

item.title: TryHackMe - Careers In Cyber Room Walkthrough
item.description: Learn about the different careers in cyber security.

item.title: TryHackMe - Blue Room Walkthrough
item.description: Deploy & hack into a Windows machine, leveraging common misconfigurations issues.

item.title: TryHackMe - Learning Cyber Security Room Walkthrough
item.description: Get a short introduction to a few of the security topics you'll be learning about.

item.title: OverTheWire Natas Walkthrough Levels 21 - 24
item.description: Walkthrough of OverTheWire Natas levels 21 - 24 with step-by-step solutions, hints, and explanations for web security beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Natas Walkthrough Levels 14 - 20
item.description: Walkthrough of OverTheWire Natas levels 14 - 20 with step-by-step solutions, hints, and explanations for web security beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Natas Walkthrough Levels 7 - 13
item.description: Walkthrough of OverTheWire Natas levels 7 - 13 with step-by-step solutions, hints, and explanations for web security beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Natas Walkthrough Levels 0 - 6
item.description: Walkthrough of OverTheWire Natas levels 0 - 6 with step-by-step solutions, hints, and explanations for web security beginners.

item.title: Overthewire Leviathan FULL Walkthrough
item.description: A full walkthrough of the OverTheWire Leviathan wargame. This guide explains all levels step by step, with hints and solutions for beginners to learn privilege escalation, file permissions, and basic binary exploitation.

item.title: Overthewire Krypton FULL Walkthrough
item.description: A complete walkthrough of the OverTheWire Krypton wargame. Learn cryptography basics, covering classical ciphers, encryption/decryption techniques, and password cracking methods

item.title: OverTheWire Bandit Beginner Levels 31 - 33
item.description: A step-by-step walkthrough of OverTheWire Bandit beginner levels 31 to 33. Learn Linux basics, file manipulation, permissions, and commands through hands-on CTF challenges — perfect for cybersecurity beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Bandit Beginner Levels 26 - 30
item.description: A step-by-step walkthrough of OverTheWire Bandit beginner levels 26 to 30. Learn Linux basics, file manipulation, permissions, and commands through hands-on CTF challenges — perfect for cybersecurity beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Bandit Beginner Levels 21 - 25
item.description: A step-by-step walkthrough of OverTheWire Bandit beginner levels 21 to 25. Learn Linux basics, file manipulation, permissions, and commands through hands-on CTF challenges — perfect for cybersecurity beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Bandit Beginner Levels 16 - 20
item.description: A step-by-step walkthrough of OverTheWire Bandit beginner levels 16 to 20. Learn Linux basics, file manipulation, permissions, and commands through hands-on CTF challenges — perfect for cybersecurity beginners.

item.title: OverTheWire Bandit Beginner Levels 0 - 15
item.description: A step-by-step walkthrough of OverTheWire Bandit beginner levels 0 to 15. Learn Linux basics, file manipulation, permissions, and commands through hands-on CTF challenges — perfect for cybersecurity beginners.

item.title: This Is My Website
item.description: This is my personal website where I write about Cybersecurity (CTFs, OverTheWire, tools, tips), Tech & programming, My personal journey in learning and building projects.
